text:
Prithvi Vallabh - Itihaas Bhi, Rahasya Bhi is an Indian television historical drama. The series will be broadcast on from Sony Entertainment Television (India).
The show will be produced by Anirudh Pathak and the production company Writer's Galaxy. The story is based on the book of Gujarati writer Kanhayalal Munshi This show is the first production of Sony Pictures Networks India's sub-branch SET originals. The show will premiere on 20th January 2018.
Plot.
The story follows the life journey of two kings. Prithvi Vallabh, king of Avantipur, a kind of peaceful man and Tailap, the neighboring King, who is very cruel.
Prithvi is captured and imprisoned. He falls in love with Tailap's sister Mrinalvati.
